scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --validate --sourceMap --debug --use abort=wasiabort --runtime stub
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --validate -O3 --use abort=wasiabort --runtime stub
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
